SELECT COUNT(A.SN) FROM MBLTN_MLTMD A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM077') B ON A.MLTMD_CODE = B.CODE WHERE 1=1
AND A.MBER_ID LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND B.CODE_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND A.MLTMD_SJ LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND A.BROWSER_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'

SELECT SN , MBER_ID , MLTMD_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM077' AND CODE = MLTMD_CODE ) AS MLTMD_NM , MLTMD_SJ , ATCH_FILE_ID , BROWSER_NM , CREAT_DT , UPDT_DT FROM MBLTN_MLTMD WHERE SN = #{sn}
